Blog.post: haiz.. today still the same.. moRning wake up go school... study~~and study~~ lolx.. tat's wad sch life is.. today teacher give back phy paper.. hahaz.. luckily mi still not bad.. got a A1..75 .. lolx.. tomor gonna give back chem liao.. hahaz. think can pass la.. cos teacher got say the ans.. think so la.. aft school.. go eat lunch.. then go 4 choir sectional... tired sia.. have to sing... until 5.45pm then dismiss.. then take a bus trip of 40 mins to reach home.. still need to study 4 bio and a math test which is on tis thurs.. it's getting nearer and nearer,.. lolx.. got to study hard... or else parents will say i use com until my results bad.. lolx .. ok.. got to stop here.. will be back tomor.. signing off... =)..

~~~ Haiz.. stressed sia.. thursday got 2 test.. A math and Bio.. Wed still gt choir.. haiz.. surely not enough time to study de.. mayb study a bit bio 2nite.. still got hmwk.. bio workbk.. today, nth much happen la.. morning wake up very early.. then go to school early.. abt 6.45am. today's 2 period of bio and elect geo not so boring la.. jus copy ans from teacher into the workbks... sian sia . Worried abt my eng common test marks.. scared get single digit.. if reali that 'sway'., i will surely die.. my parents won't let mi off de.. hahaz.. cos some of my subj marks are not that good alreadi ... lolx.. aft sch, eat lunch.. then go library do that 'hook on reading'.. finally do finish liao.. no need to worry abt tis le.. hahaz.. today shirin's birthday .. hahaz.. i chipped in $5 to her birthday present.. Hope she will work hard in her work.. hahaz.. ok.. i think i will end here le.. nth to write liao.. will b back tomor.. StaY HApI =) ~~~

today ar?.. still ok lor.. a bit too lag liao.. a lot of hmwk haven completed.. but i managed to do finish my phy and a bit of bio workbk.. hahaz.. have been playing too much liao.. have to do some reflections on myself.. hahaz.. grades are decreasing...how?.. haiz.. stressed sia.. dunno what to do.. Started doing my a math in the afternoon.. very difficult manx.. a lot dunno.. then give up.. as tomor no A math.. lolx.. tomor is a brand new day of a week.. hate monday.. last 4 periods.. sian sia.. 2 periods elect geo. 2 period bio.. haiz.. have to struggled and work hard.. Still got a lot Uncompleted hmwk..haiz.. hope i can finish them fast.. Stay Hapi always..=)

haiz.. today is a boring day sia.. morning go school for eng and chem common test.. haiz.. eng d**n difficult sia.. a lot of people can't finish lor.. too many qns liao.. and the passage consist of 10 paragraph lehz... read until siao... chem test still ok lor.. still manage to finish b4 time.. after test.. go play soccer with nei , cc, hao and min they all.. field so wet sia.. mayb because of yesterday rain lorx.. haha.. make my shoe and long pants dirty .. haiz.. afternoon ar?.. when i went home.. my ez link card siao liao.. cannot scan.. die.. go home eat lunch.. then have to go hougang interchange to replaced another one.. tis afternoon very hot.. making mi giddy.. even now.. mi feeling like going to fall sick... hope nOT.. hahaz.. ok.. tat's all 4 2dae.. hope tomor will not B unluncky and boring...=(
hiz .. mi kaibin.. new here.. i will post whenever i free..
